title: MarketWatch - Is The American Consumer Running Scared?
description: Quentin Fottrell, managing editor, personal finance at MarketWatch, will talk to MarketWatch economics editor Gregory Robb about the impact inflation and economic uncertainty is having on the U.S. shopper in the runup to the holiday season, and whether their anxieties are justified.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
